Combat-Flip
If there is a friendly creature to my right, we swap places, and the attack continues normally.

name: tempower
description:
Safe-Flip:
Raise my power by 8.At the end of your every turn, if my power is 2 or higher, decrease it by %%1.

name: grower
description: At the end of your turn if I am face-up in play, increase my power by 1.

name: resurrecter5
description: When I die from combat and enter your graveyard, flip the top card in your deck face-up. If it is a creature and can be auto-summoned in my place, summon it.

name: trap cleanup1
description: Activate when any other trap in play is activated. Negate its effect and destroy all traps in play.

name: column cleanup
description:
Activate when opposing enemy trap is activated.
Negate its effect and destroy it along with both players' creatures and traps on the same column if any.

name: Deadly Sacrifice
description: Activate when opposing enemy creature attacks and there is a friendly creature on your own side. Destroy both creatures, but take damage equal to the enemy creature's power.

name: Trap-Peek
description: Activate when opposing enemy trap is set. Flip it face-up without activating, then flip it back face-down.

name: Trap-Steal
description: When opposing enemy trap is about to leave play, add it to your hand instead.

name: Trap-Trap 2
description: Activate when opposing enemy trap is activated while there is a friendly creature on this column. Your creature is sacrificed and the enemy trap is added to your hand, aborting its activation.

name: Deadly Non-Sacrifice
description: Activate when opposing enemy creature attacks and there is a friendly creature on your own side. Destroy the enemy creature, but take damage equal to both creatures' power.

name: enemyhealer
description:
#persistent
Activate when you are about to receive damage from any source. While I am in play, any damage you are about to receive becomes 0, but the enemy gains LP of the same amount. Destroy at the end of the enemy's turn.

name: Taunt
description: Activate when opposing enemy creature is about to be manually relocated. Force is to perform a free attack first.

name: move2ctrl
description: Activate when opposing enemy creature is about to be relocated during their turn and there is a friendly creature on your side of it. Destroy your creature and relocate the enemy creature in its place. It is now under your control.

name: Forsaken Being 4
description: While I am in play, the power of every other Forsaken-Being is increased by 5.

name: Forsaken Being 1
description: While I am in play, the power of every other Forsaken-Being is increased by 5.

name: Forsaken Being 2
description: While I am in play, the power of every other Forsaken-Being is increased by 5.

name: Forsaken Being 3
description: While I am in play, the power of every other Forsaken-Being is increased by 5.

name: Supreme Bro #1
description: My power is raised by 3 while a friendly @grandbro2 is also in play.

name: Supreme Bro #2
description: My power is raised by 3 while a friendly @grandbro1 is also in play.

name: NightElf-1
description: My power is raised by 1 for each other NightElf in your graveyard.

name: NightElf-4
description: My power is raised by 1 for each other NightElf in your graveyard.

name: NightElf-3
description: My power is raised by 1 for each other NightElf in your graveyard.

name: NightElf-2
description: My power is raised by 1 for each other NightElf in your graveyard.

name: BroodElf
description: My power is raised by 3 for each other BroodElf in your graveyard.

name: BroodElf
description: My power is raised by 3 for each other BroodElf in your graveyard.

name: BroodElf
description: My power is raised by 3 for each other BroodElf in your graveyard.

name: BroodElf
description: My power is raised by 3 for each other BroodElf in your graveyard.

name: summon2atk
description: Actuvate when opposing enemy creature is summoned. It does not suffer summon exhaustion. If it can attack, force it to perform a manual attack.

name: swapper
description: I can relocate to an occupied creature field on your side, by swapping places with the creature there. This does not count as relocation for the other creature.
While I am in play, all creatures summoned on any side do not suffer summon exhaustion.

name: grandgrandpaul
description:
I can only be summoned by tributing another grand-creature.
I do not suffer summon exhaustion.

name: ppjeoy
description: At the beginning of your turn, if I am face up in play, return me to your hand.

name: m7x4yl
description: Reduce the power of any enemy creatures on the opposing field by %%0 while I am in play.

name: Black Hood
description: At the end of your turn, destroy all face-up creatures with power lower than mine.

name: Re-Trapper2
description: When your own trap card on this column leaves play, set it back face-down in the same place, then return me to your hand.

name: dmgup
description: Activate when the enemy is about to receive direct damage during their own turn. Increase that damage by 5;

name: vouerer
description: When opposing enemy creature dies during your own turn, my power is decreased by its power.

name: anti flip1
description: When an opposing enemy creature is summoned face-down, flip it face-up without activating any of its flip effects.

name: deadly sacrifice2
description: Activate when opposing enemy creature attacks and there is a friendly creature on your own side. Destroy your own creature and return the enemy creature to its owner's hand.

name: Trap-Trap 2
description: Activate when any enemy trap is activated while there is a friendly creature on this column. Your creature is sacrificed and the enemy trap is destroyed, its effect negated.

name: Doomsday
description: When I die, destroy all creatures.

name: Fury
description: Activate when you are dealt direct damage by the opposing enemy creature. Destroy all enemy creatures with power lower than that damage.

name: Crowd-Powered
description: Raise my power by 1 for each creature in play, other than me.

name: Mario
description: After I attack if possible I relocate to the field on the right, else if possible - to the left.

name: Re-trap
description: Activate when another friendly trap leaves play. Set it back on its last occupied trap-field.

name: com g3 1
description: Combines with G3

name: com g3 1
description: Combines with G3

name: grand copycat
description: When I am summoned, if there is an opposing face-up enemy creature, I gain power equal to its current power plus 1.

name: No-Flippers!
description:
Activate me when an opposing enemy creature's combat-flip effect is triggered.
Negate that effect.

name: Mana-Drain
description: Activate when opposing enemy creature is summoned manually. The enemy's mana is depleted instantly.

name: Eject
description: When an enemy creature enters the opposing field for any reason, return it to its owner's hand.

name: swapper3
description: I can relocate to an occupied creature field on your side, by swapping places with the creature there. This does not count as relocation for the other creature.

name: gcontract swap
description:
IN-GRAVE
While I am the top card in your grave, all of your creatures can be manually relocated to occupied creature fields as well as empty, by swapping places with the creature there. This does not count as relocation for the other creature.

name: megasweeper
description: At the end of your turn destroy all creatures in play with power higher than 16.

name: Blood-Haggler II
description:
Combat-Flip
Stun opposing creature until the end of the turn.Take 3 direct damage and return me to your hand.

name: Time-Reverser
description:
Combat-Flip:
Add the top card in your graveyard to the top of your deck.

name: summon2move
description: Activate when the opposing enemy creature field is empty and an enemy creature is summoned to a different field. Move it to the opposing field.

name: draw deckstruction
description:
#persistent
Activate at the start of the enemy's turn. Until the end of their turn, for every card they draw, they discard 2 cards from the top of their deck.

name: empower III
description:
#persistent
Activate at the begiinning of the enemy's turn, if there is a friendly face-up creature on this column. Raise its power by 2 every time an enemy creature attacks until the end of your own turn.

name: super empower
description:
#persistent
Activate at the begiinning of the enemy's turn, if there is a friendly face-up creature on this column. Raise its power by 7 until the end of the turn.

name: empower2
description:
#persistent
Activate at the begiinning of the enemy's turn, if there is a friendly face-up creature on this column. Raise its power by 1 every time an enemy creature attacks. Destroy at the end of the turn.

name: spynet
description:
#persistent
Activate at the beginning of the enemy turn. Until the end of their turn, every time they set a new trap or summon a creature face-down, they must show you what it is first.

name: deckstructor2
description:
Combat-Flip:
Enemy discards 4 cards from their deck.

name: yqfu19
description:
When I am summoned, I perform a free attack.

name: bomb9
description:
Destroy me at the end of the enemy turn.
When I die, if possible, destroy the opposing enemy creature and all adjacent friendly creatures in play.

name: foe linkee2
description: While I am in play, when an enemy creature is summoned, life-link me to it, unless I am already life-linked to a creature.

name: linker
description: When I am summoned, if there are friendly creatures adjacent to me, life-link me to them, else - destroy me.

name: t1fys8
description: Activate when an opposing enemy creature begins an attack and there is a face-up flippable friendly creature with a combat-flip effect on the same column. Flip your creature face-down.

name: kw55ly
description: Activate when an opposing enemy creature is summoned and there is a face-up flippable friendly creature with a safe-flip effect on the same column. Flip your creature face-down.

name: crippler
description:
Safe-Flip:
If possible, decrease opposing enemy creature's power by 5.

name: doubleattacker
description: After I finish an attack, if I am still in play I automatically perform another attack.

name: directo1
description: At the end of the enemy turn, if there is an opposing enemy creature, deal 1 direct damage  to them.

name: binaro
description: My power equals 2 to the power of your current mana amount.

name: rock
description: My power equals the current power of my tribute at the moment of its death.

safe-flip:
Kill opposite enemy, if its power is 15 or above.

Opposite unit cannot attack.
At the start of your turn, if there is no opposite unit, I die.
If opposite grand unit attacks, negate the attack, but the enemy draws one card.
My power increases each time you spend an action point.
When: opp. Summon and ally unit exists - destroy ally unitv and take control of opposing unit.
While I am in play, units with 11 or above cannot attack

Combat-Flip:
Destroy attacking creature and this card, but deal damage to yourself equal to enemy creature's power at the time of death.

Combat-Flip:
If it's the enemy's turn - after the attack finishes, end their turn.

Combat-Flip
Kill me and resurrect the first Grand creature you find in your graveyard.

Combat-Flip
You draw two cards.
I cannot be destroyed in combat. When a new friendly creature is summoned, life-link me to it.
When a new friendly creature is summoned, life-link me to it.
While I am in play - opponent keeps the top card in his deck face-up at all times.
Activation condition and effect of this card equals that of the top card in your graveyard (if any and if it is a trap)
+2 power for each ally
Activate when opposing enemy creature is summoned and there is a stronger creature on your side. Swap creatures.
Activate me when enemy turn starts and they have an opposing creature. At the end of their turn, if there is still an opposing enemy creature, force it to attack.
